inclusion.criterion: Diagnosed with MG by a neurologist
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stage II or III according to the Clinical Classification of the Medialia Gravis Functional Assessment (MGFA)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Volunteer to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Cognitive problem and Mini Mental Test score below 24
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Myasthenic crisis in the last month
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Modification of medical treatment and dose in the last month
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Systemic, orthopedic and neurological disease in addition to the disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Participation in physiotherapy program in the last six months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently experiencing progressive lower extremity weakness and urinary retention.
